Message:
As a child, I was infected by
a terrible disease that left me
hanging between life and death.

No one thought there was
any hope for me to survive,
so everyone gave up...

But, there was one person
who didn’t—

She kept my spirits up as
I suffered through nightmares,
sacrificing her own sleep
to nurse me.

“Stop! You’re going to
get yourself infected, too.
Just leave me alone...”

I rejected her help,
but that didn’t
dissuade her at all.
praying to God day after day...
